TopicTitle: "Duna, Ore Bust!" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (COMPLETE)

Articles.Content:
That was a truly magnificent story with drama, suspense, humor, spaceflight, a mystery about the nature of the cosmos, and Kerbals. I can't wait to see these guys return in the future, and to see more of the story of KerbFleet in Eve: Order Zero.

Now I want a mod that adds proper Kerbal ranks, with these neato rank titles. Can you give a full lust of the rank titles?

> 
> That was a truly magnificent story with drama, suspense, humor, spaceflight, a mystery about the nature of the cosmos, and Kerbals. I can't wait to see these guys return in the future, and to see more of the story of KerbFleet in Eve: Order Zero.
> Now I want a mod that adds proper Kerbal ranks, with these neato rank titles. Can you give a full lust of the rank titles?

So something like Kerbal Portraits with rank insignias? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> That was a truly magnificent story with drama, suspense, humor, spaceflight, a mystery about the nature of the cosmos, and Kerbals. I can't wait to see these guys return in the future, and to see more of the story of KerbFleet in Eve: Order Zero.
> Now I want a mod that adds proper Kerbal ranks, with these neato rank titles. Can you give a full lust of the rank titles?

Thank you! The titles mirror USN/USAF ranks as follows, parallel ranks being equivalent:

[TABLE=width: 200]

[TR]

[TD]SpaceService[/TD]

[TD]Air Service[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Enzin[/TD]

[TD]2nd Looty[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Junior Looty[/TD]

[TD]1st Looty[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Looty[/TD]

[TD]Kaptin[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Looty Comder[/TD]

[TD]Majer[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Comder[/TD]

[TD]Looty Kernel[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Kaptin[/TD]

[TD]Kernel[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Rank insignia for Space service is pretty intuitive, pattern is the same as USN and of course the color of the stripes are per the officer's specialty. Only Command Pilots can hold the rank of Kaptin in the Space Service. Air Service ranks would look like USAF insignia, but I've only drawn the Looty Kernel insignia so far. Color that goldish and you've got Majer, simple silver/gold bars will do for the lower ranks. If I ever have to show insignia for a full Kernel it will look vaguely eagle shaped but will not in fact be an eagle ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

By the way it's also rumored that there exists a Kerfleet Surface Mobility Corps (KSMC), who are a branch of the Space Service but use ranks similar to Air. KSMC personnel specialize in driving rovers and have a reputation for being somewhat hardcore... "From the rolling hills of Duuu-u-na/to the shores of Laythe's seas..." You get the idea ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I know I'm a little late, but tou might try Free IVA. for the Eve missions. Fair warning: It's still in development so it might be buggy.

> 
> I know I'm a little late, but tou might try Free IVA. for the Eve missions. Fair warning: It's still in development so it might be buggy.

Yeah, I tried it, it seems to fight with Texture Replacer and delete my kerbals' heads. Oh well--thanks anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
That would make for some interesting reading.

> 
> Yeah, I tried it, it seems to fight with Texture Replacer and delete my kerbals' heads. Oh well--thanks anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oh, that isn't Texture Replacer. I don't use it, and have the same problem with Free IVA. The kerbal whose POV you're using either disappears or gets beheaded.
Just found this gem! Awesome work, very entertaining! Off to read the next mission book....

Thanks [@Ehco Corrallo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/154785-ehco-corrallo/), really glad you liked this! But there is yet another complete comic between this one and the Jool one, all about Kerbfleet's mission to Eve. Chapters of that actually overlap with some of the later ones from this story. Link to the Eve thread is in my sig, and links to each chapter's imgur album (in proper story order) appear on the first post. Enjoy!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-15T19:34:45Z" title="03/15/2016 07:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">March 15, 2016</time> by max\_creative**
  
Spell check got mad at me

Well, that is just fantastic and delightful. I'm on Chapter Four of Duna, Ore Bust! and I just got to the Robert Frost parody, which prompted this reply. I memorized "Stopping By Woods on a Snowy Evening" as a kid long ago, so I got a real kick out of that.

Any chance we can get a pdf of this?  

Waiting for my work computer to load each new panel on each new forum page is really damping the effect of my eyes brimming with tears at every third panel. I love, love, LOVE what you've done!

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, MitchS said:
> 
> 
> Any chance we can get a pdf of this?
> 

Thank you! So glad you like it! Well we don't have a PDF, but if you go to the first page you'll find links to imgur albums for every chapter which may be the next best thing. Also note that there is some overlap between this story and the next, which means you might read things in the wrong order if you do it by Forum page but you'll get them all in right sequence if you go by the links on the <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr> ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Really appreciate that guys! We'll see, maybe this is the year I approach [@SQUAD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/66485-squad/) about license to publish Kerbfleet comics in some form or another. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
